trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were no other sightings in Stephenville on or around April 30th 1969
divs: Sighting DetailsI was about 9 yrs old in Stephenville, Tx. and taking the trash out through the backyard. I walked about halfway to the fence when a circle of bluish light shone all around me from directly above. I would say the circle was about 8-10 feet in dia. on the ground. I looked up and all I could see was the light. It was bright but it didn't hurt my eyes. It lasted about 15- 20 seconds, not long, I didn't think anything about it. This was back in the summer of '68 or '69. I didn't tell anyone about it because they would think I was looney. Anyway, that winter, at the spot where the light shone down, the grass stayed green and needed mowing. I remember my dad getting upset because my mom made him mow that spot just about every week. That winter was the only one that I remember the grass growing throughout the winter. It was St. Augustine grass. I wasn't scared or anything, because I didn't know any better. I had my head down watching where I was walking so as not to step in dog mess. Then just suddenly, a bluish light circle lit me up. I looked up and yep, it was a blue light. It lasted about 15-20 seconds and then it just turned off. No craft, no nothing, no stucture or anything where the light was. I was looking at it when it turned off. There was nothing there that I can remember. I emptied the trash and went in the house. It was just getting the dark part of dusk. It was pretty dark outside but not quite night. I could see stars and I don't recall seeing the moon. Anyway, I told my wife about this some years ago. She says she believes me but, I think she was just saying that. We saw the Stephenville UFO show on the History channel the other day and she insisted that I tell y'all about it. She also thinks now that because of the incident, I heal faster than just about anybody I know. I would like to thank you for your time. I feel better knowing that there are some people who will listen to things like this with open minds.
Summary: A circle of light shone on me and the grass didn't die that winter in the cricle
